name: gdgprobation
description: Eunoia is a full-stack web application designed for personal wellness and self-care. It allows users to track their habits, log their moods, and record their thoughts, providing powerful visualizations to help them understand their mental and emotional patterns.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: cd backend && npx prisma generate && node server.js
